about_the_game:
Welcome to Five Laps at Freddy's, The premier animatronic kart racing circuit featuring you favorite and lovable Fazbear friends! Sponsored by Fazbear Entertainment

Try out one of three tracks in this free demo, Free of charge and no obligation purchase, brought to you by Fazbear Entertainment's community out reach program!
detailed_description:
Welcome to Five Laps at Freddy's, The premier animatronic kart racing circuit featuring you favorite and lovable Fazbear friends! Sponsored by Fazbear Entertainment

Try out one of three tracks in this free demo, Free of charge and no obligation purchase, brought to you by Fazbear Entertainment's community out reach program!
name: Five Laps at Freddy's Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-4430K CPU @ 3.00GHz (4 CPUs)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 (3GB)/AMD Radeon R9 290x (4GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-6402p CPU @ 2.80GHz (4 CPUs) / AMD Ryzen 5 2600 (3.4 GHz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 (6GB)/AMD RX 5600 XT (6GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
